Snack recipe: Potato Wedges Servings: 3 Duration: 45 minutes Potato wedges loved by everyone ğŸ˜ƒ they are very simple to make and I appreciate myself theyâ€™re so tasty as same as earlier. Potato wedges can prepare baked or fried, itâ€™s the best side for dinner or party ğŸŠÂ time or as a winter snack at home ğŸ¡. I baked these gorgeous wedges with simple seasoning ingredients theyâ€™re easily available at kitchen shelves. Any one can cook these wedges, theyâ€™re served in many restaurants with ranch/ ketchup/ red chilly sauce/ mayonnaise to dip ğŸ˜‹ Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Golden Potatoes - 3 - large sized - Cut as Wedges
  • Red paprika - 2 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Black Pepper Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Olive oil - 1 Tb sp
Procedure:
  • Add in all ingredients in a mixing bowl
  • Combine well and make sure each potato wedge coated well with spices and oil
  • Marinate 10 minutes
  • Preheat oven at 400F or 200 C and bake them 40 minutes
  • When theyâ€™re done , takeout them and serve immediately
  • Potato Wedges are ready you can have them with any sauce as you like, I served them with tomato ğŸ…Â ketchup
  • Happy Cooking and have a lovely ğŸ˜ŠÂ day
